name: MedicationReconciliationEncounterCodesMSSPACO
title: Medication Reconciliation Encounter Codes MSSP ACO
description: The value set represents the encounters for MSSP ACO  ACO 12 CARE-1 Medication Reconciliation Post-Discharge.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Medication reconciliation after an inpatient discharge.),(Data Element Scope: Encounters where medication reconciliation should occur after an inpatient discharge.),(Inclusion Criteria: Codes for encounters where medication reconciliation should occur after an inpatient discharge.),(Exclusion Criteria: n/a)

Office or other outpatient visit for the evaluation and management of a new patient, which requires a medically appropriate history and/or examination and straightforward medical decision making. When using total time on the date of the encounter for code selection, 15 minutes must be met or exceeded.

When using total time on the date of the encounter for code selection, 30 minutes must be met or exceeded.

When using total time on the date of the encounter for code selection, 60 minutes must be met or exceeded.
